author: jackcarey (jackcarey.co.uk)
description: A collection of web components for a variety purposes.
name: web-components

scripts.test:ci: npm run storybook:build && concurrently -k -s first -n "SB,TEST" -c "magenta,blue" "npx http-server storybook-static --port 6006 --silent" "wait-on tcp:6006 && npm run test:coverage"
scripts.build:docs: npm i && node scripts/install-deps-at-root.mjs && node scripts/generate-storybook-docs.mjs && node scripts/generate-pkg-readmes.mjs && node scripts/generate-root-readme.mjs && storybook build
scripts.serve:ci: npm run build:docs && npm run storybook
